sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-menu offset-y>
    <template v-slot:activator="{ on }">
      <v-btn text v-on="on" :class="{ 'red lighten-4 rounded' : isError}">
      {{ formatDateToJa(value) || '日付を選択' }}
      </v-btn>
    </template>

    <v-date-picker
      :value="value.replace(/\//g, '-')"
      no-title
      locale="ja-ja"
      :day-format="value => new Date(value).getDate()"
    ></v-date-picker>
  </v-menu>

  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="12" sm="6" md="4">
        <datetime
          type="datetime"
          v-model="start_time"
          placeholder="Start Time"
          :minute-step="15"
          auto
        ></datetime>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
    
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="12" sm="6" md="4">
        <datetime
          type="datetime"
          v-model="end_time"
          placeholder="End Time"
          :minute-step="15"
          auto
        ></datetime>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { formatDateToJa } from '../../functions/datetime';

import { Datetime } from 'vue-datetime';
import 'vue-datetime/dist/vue-datetime.css';

export default {

  components: {
    datetime: Datetime
  },

  data: () => ({
  datetime: '',
  }),

  name: 'DateForm',
  props: ['value', 'isError'],
  methods: {
    formatDateToJa,
  },
};
</script>
